name: Deathtrap Dungeon: The Interactive Video Adventure
summary: Deathtrap Dungeon is an interactive video realisation of Ian Livingstone's multi-million selling classic gamebook starring Eddie Marsan (Fast & Furious presents Hobbes & Shaw, Deadpool 2, Atomic Blonde) as narrator.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 平台: iOS
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: AVG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020年4月30日
  • 开发: Branching Narrative
  • 发行: Branching Narrative
